argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isline2.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 2 |  | isline2.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 3 |  | isline2.n | |- N = ( Lines ` K ) |
| 4 |  | isline2.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 6 | 5, 1, 2, 3 | #P_isline | |- ( K e. Lat -> ( X e. N <-> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( p .\/ q ) } ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_atbase | |- ( p e. A -> p e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ad2antrl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> p e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 2 | #P_atbase | |- ( q e. A -> q e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ad2antll | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> q e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 1 | #P_latjcl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ p e. ( Base ` K ) /\ q e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( p .\/ q ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 14 | 7, 10, 12, 13 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> ( p .\/ q ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 5, 2, 4 | #P_pmapval | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p .\/ q ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( p .\/ q ) } ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( p .\/ q ) } ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> ( X = ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) <-> X = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( p .\/ q ) } ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_anbi2d | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( p e. A /\ q e. A ) ) -> ( ( p =/= q /\ X = ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) ) <-> ( p =/= q /\ X = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( p .\/ q ) } ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_2rexbidva | |- ( K e. Lat -> ( E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) ) <-> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = { r e. A | r ( le ` K ) ( p .\/ q ) } ) ) ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_bitr4d | |- ( K e. Lat -> ( X e. N <-> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = ( M ` ( p .\/ q ) ) ) ) ) |
